about_the_game: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre Content Pass includes immediate access to playable Family members 2003 Leatherface and Bones, playable victim Wyatt, Execution Pack 4 and the Victim Summertime Outfit Pack, and three new cosmetics as they release. The listed cosmetic items and characters will release throughout the months of September 2024 to February 2025, and will also be separately purchasable. If purchased after February 2025, all content will be immediately available. Requires The Texas Chain Saw Massacre; sold separately.

content_descriptors.notes: This game regularly depicts violence and gore.
